alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kleberg County through 615 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riviera Beach, or 13 miles northeast of Sarita, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Kleberg County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
